channel.title: Delete item command

item.title: Delete item command
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

well, in my server, i have commands to give a certain player a certain item. i was wondering if anyone knew how to make a command to take a specific item from a specific playerâ€¦ here is an example of the command to give a player an item:

if (cmd[0].equals("TheItem") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("MyNameHere")) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
 	   p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have given a ???????? to " + p2.username + "!");
 	   p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been given ??????? by " + p.username + "!");
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, TheItemID, Quantity);
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p2.updateReq = true;
              }
}

thanks everyone!
